# Packwiz temporary / generated files
index/
*.pw.toml
packwiz-installer-bootstrap.jar
packwiz-installer-bootstrap.sh
packwiz-installer-bootstrap.exe

# Minecraft instance files (do NOT commit these)
.minecraft/
mods/
config/
crash-reports/
logs/
saves/
resourcepacks/
shaderpacks/
options.txt
optionsof.txt
options.txt_old
launcher_profiles.json
minecraftinstance.json          # ← CurseForge / Prism specific
instance.cfg                    # ← Prism / ATLauncher
modlist.html
usercache.json
usernamecache.json

# Common large / unnecessary files
*.jar                           # ← actual mod jars (Packwiz downloads them)
*.zip
*.mrpack
*.zip.old
backups/
exports/
overrides/                      # ← only if you're not using it intentionally

# OS / editor files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
*.swp
*~
.vscode/
.idea/
*.code-workspace

# Temporary build / test files you might create
test/
dev/
temp/
